hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Dharr: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said to me: Abu Dharr, I see you weak, and I like for you what I like for myself. Do not be a leader of two (persons), and do not be a guardian of an orphan. Abu Dawud said: This has been narrated only by the people of Egypt

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الدُّخُولِ فِي الْوَصَايَا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Accepting The Position Of Executing A Will
